data.name: AssemblyDescription
data.value: SonarScanner for MSBuild Begin Step

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_InstallTargets
data.value: /install:[true|false] - install standard MSBuild targets required for analysis (default true)

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_Organization
data.value: /organization:[Organization to which the project belongs]

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectKey
data.value: /key:[SonarQube/SonarCloud project key]

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectName
data.value: /name:[SonarQube/SonarCloud project name] - required for SonarQube < 6.1

data.name: CmdLine_ArgDescription_ProjectVersion
data.value: /version:[SonarQube/SonarCloud project version] - required for SonarQube < 6.1

data.name: ERROR_CmdLine_InvalidInstallTargetsValue
data.value: Invalid value for /install: {0}. Valid values are "true" or "false".

data.name: ERROR_DownloadingQualityProfileFailed
data.value: Cannot download quality profile. Check scanner arguments and the reported URL for more information.

data.name: ERROR_DuplicateCheckId
data.value: The following CheckId should not appear multiple times: {0}

data.name: ERROR_InvalidCommandLineArgs
data.value: Expecting at least the following command line argument: - SonarQube/SonarCloud project key The full path to a settings file can also be supplied. If it is not supplied, the exe will attempt to locate a default settings file in the same directory as the SonarQube Scanner for MSBuild. Use '/?' or '/h' to see the help message.

data.name: ERROR_InvalidProjectKeyArg
data.value: Invalid project key. Allowed characters are alphanumeric, '-', '_', '.' and ':', with at least one non-digit.

data.name: ERROR_MissingSetting
data.value: Missing analysis setting: {0}

data.name: ERROR_Organization_Provided_In_SonarQubeAnalysis_file
data.value: sonar.organization parameter has been detected in the provided SonarQube.Analysis.xml config file. Please pass it in the command line instead, using /o: flag.

data.name: ERROR_UnsupportedSonarQubeVersion
data.value: It seems that you are using an old version of SonarQube which is not supported anymore. Please update to at least 6.7.

data.name: ERR_InvalidCredentials
data.value: Unauthorized: Access is denied due to invalid credentials. Please check the authentication parameters.

data.name: ERR_UnlicensedServer
data.value: Your SonarQube instance seems to have an invalid license. Please check it. Server url: {0}

data.name: ERR_UnableToConnectToServer
data.value: Unable to connect to server. Please check if the server is running and if the address is correct. Url: '{0}'.

data.name: ERR_MissingOrganization
data.value: Organization parameter (/o:"<organization>") is required and needs to be provided!

data.name: ERR_InvalidSonarHostUrl
data.value: The value provided for the host URL parameter ({0}) is not valid. Please make sure that you have entered a valid URL and try again.

data.name: ERR_MissingUriScheme
data.value: The URL ({0}) provided does not contain the scheme. Please include 'http://' or 'https://' at the beginning.

data.name: ERR_ErrorWhenQueryingServerVersion
data.value: An error occured while querying the server version! Please check if the server is running and if the address is correct.

data.value: The property '{0}' defined in SonarQube is deprecated. Set the property 'sonar.msbuild.testProjectPattern' in the scanner instead.

data.name: WCD_UserNameCannotContainColon
data.value: username cannot contain the ':' character due to basic authentication limitations

data.name: WCD_UserNameMustBeAscii
data.value: username and password should contain only ASCII characters due to basic authentication limitations

data.value: Cannot determine project base path. Incremental PR analysis is disabled.

data.value: Incremental PR Analysis: Requesting 'prepare_read' from {0}

data.name: ERR_SonarQubeUnsupported
data.value: SonarQube versions below 8.9 are not supported anymore by the SonarScanner for .NET. Please upgrade your SonarQube version to 8.9 or above or use an older version of the scanner (< 6.0.0), to be able to run the analysis.

data.name: MSG_CheckingVersionSupported
data.value: Checking if the server version is supported...

data.name: MSG_SonarCloudDetected_SkipVersionCheck
data.value: SonarCloud detected, skipping server version check.

data.name: ERR_DotNetAnalyzersNotFound
data.value: Could not find any dotnet analyzer plugin on the server (SonarQube/SonarCloud)!

data.name: ERR_HostUrlAndSonarcloudUrlAreEmpty
data.value: The arguments 'sonar.host.url' and 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' are both set to an invalid value.

data.name: ERR_HostUrlDiffersFromSonarcloudUrl
data.value: The arguments 'sonar.host.url' and 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' are both set and are different. Please set either 'sonar.host.url' for SonarQube or 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' for SonarCloud.

data.name: WARN_HostUrlAndSonarcloudUrlSet
data.value: The arguments 'sonar.host.url' and 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' are both set. Please set only 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl'.

data.name: ERROR_InvalidJavaExePath
data.value: The argument 'sonar.scanner.javaExePath' contains an invalid path. Please make sure the path is correctly pointing to the java executable.

data.name: ERROR_InvalidSkipJreProvisioning
data.value: The argument 'sonar.scanner.skipJreProvisioning' has an invalid value. Please ensure it is set to either 'true' or 'false'.

data.name: MSG_ServerInfo_ApiUrlDetected
data.value: Api Url: {0}

data.value: Is SonarCloud: {0}

data.name: MSG_ServerInfo_ServerUrlDetected
data.value: Server Url: {0}

data.name: ERR_DetectedErroneouslySonarCloud
data.value: Detected SonarCloud but server was found to be SonarQube. Please make sure the correct combination of 'sonar.host.url' and 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' is set.

data.name: ERR_DetectedErroneouslySonarQube
data.value: Detected SonarQube but server was found to be SonarCloud. Please make sure the correct combination of 'sonar.host.url' and 'sonar.scanner.sonarcloudUrl' is set.

data.name: WARN_JreMetadataNotRetrieved
data.value: JRE Metadata could not be retrieved from {0}.
